name: El-Sozduk - Kyrgyz translator and dictionary
description: El-Sozduk provides access to the most popular dictionaries of the Kyrgyz language. There are both English-Kyrgyz (more than 8000 of the most frequently used words) and Kyrgyz-English dictionaries (more than 7000 of the most frequently used words) created by T. Abdiev and L. Sydykova. These dictionaries install in device memory. Additionally, the app provides online access to other dictionaries.  * Our phrasebook includes pronunciations from native speaker. Phrases are provided with both English and Russian translations.  * Integrated Google Translator * Access a list of frequently used 2000 Kyrgyz words with English and Russian translations. Pronunciations are from native speakers.  * Save a History of your searches  * Create a list of Favorite words  * Share translations with friends through social networks or SMS
